alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sawgrass Mills Mall, or over Sunrise, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hollywood, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Cooper City, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Nova Southeastern University, Royal Palm Ranches, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Pine Island Ridge, Markham Park and Downtown Davie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
